snippet: The Brooklyn district attorney’s request to exonerate the men, who are half-brothers, comes after a review of trial convictions obtained through the work of Detective Louis Scarcella.
abstract: Brooklyn district attorney's office will ask a judge to vacate murder convictions of Alvena Jennette, Robert Hill and Darryl Austin, three half-brothers whose trials relied on questionable evidence produced by former Detective Louis Scarcella; Scarcella was discredited after DA's office began reviewing 57 trial convictions obtained through his work.

byline.original: By FRANCES ROBLES and STEPHANIE CLIFFORD

lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn district attorney’s request to exonerate the men, who are half-brothers, comes after a review of trial convictions obtained through the work of Detective Louis Scarcella.

headline.main: 3 Are Exonerated of Murder in Cases Tied to a Discredited Detective
headline.print_headline: 3 Exonerated in Cases Tied to a Detective
